column6: Good Value but has some bugs
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020
column14: It works all right but sometimes it has glitches with the connection and it will reset. Installation was pretty easy to do and only took about an hour. If you don't have any experience with installing your own equipment I would go to a professional to get it done.  My only big gripe was the communication with the tech support team. I had an issue where the unit kept on disconnecting from my phone as well as I was unable to use my backup cameras. It took almost a week for them to tell me to do a very simple fix action to the unit. For future reference for anyone having this unit make sure your dip switches are on OFF position except for number 8, which should be ON. The unit itself works pretty well when it wants to. It's pretty fast and never freezes up.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
column14: I finally got the chance to install this hardware, and its GARBAGE! It comes on for about 5 seconds then it goes out. Says USB transmission error. I even changed the USB cable multiple times, but nothing.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2021
column14: I had this professionally installed as I do not know anything about taking a car radio apart or computers. It worked to connect to CarPlay right away but I had to contact service because phone calls weren’t working. I chatted with the service rep and they helped me very quickly fix the issue. This is a great workaround for a car that does not come with CarPlay or navigation. Great product and great service!

column6: Install can take a while and there may be function glitches but works very well.

column14: Installed in my 2017 Q50. It’s a little quirky but works very well. Starts up immediately wirelessly.

column14: Great product. Easy to install. Highly recommend. Just not enough information in the features. Example. Mirror link

column14: My unit may have been defective. The touch screen didn’t work with the motherboard plugged in but did work without it and there was a high screech from my speakers with the volume in mid and worse on high with the aux to usb cable plugged in which is needed to transfer sound to the car.
